Name: TopDownFarter
About the game: Top Down Farter includes two complete mini games: Stinky Sam (Traditional Farter - reverse fire) Space zombies have invaded earth. Enter our hero, Stinky Sam, with his rotten magical beans. Chances for earth's survival? Not good. But the chances for fartified zombies? Excellent! Diaper Dan (Fan Farter - forward fire) Dream zombies have invaded Diaper Dan's bedroom. But even the imaginary undead are no match for Diaper Dan and his deadly fart fan. Use the fart fan to mow down those zombies. Welcome to the Fart Dome. Abandon all smell ye who enter.
Meta Title: TopDownFarter: May 24, 2019, Shawn Hirsch and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on TopDownFarter? Check out the release date (May 24, 2019), developer insights from Shawn Hirsch, and a complete game summary.
